page.title: 17The Llanover Estate
page.content: The Estate has been running since 14.00.The Llanover part started to come in in the 18.00.Now there are 23 people employed,6 farm men 2 are herdsmen 2 tractor drivers 1 relief worker who is also a tractor driver and 1 foreman who is called Bryn James there are 5 woodmen and finaly 6 Estate maintenance men.20 years ago there were 33 people employed.The Estate is a family trust. There are 19 farms which are 5 dairy,4 animal, 10 lifestock and one is a hill farm all of these are rented.There are 70 acres of woodland.When they cut trees down the wood is used for pit props, fencing material and the big trees for building timbers.They have got 300 game birds.They are sold and the gunners have some.In the woodmens team there are 1forrester,4 woodmen,1 cartpenter and 1 painter.
